food_master.food_id: Unique identifier for the food item (string)
food_master.display_name: Human-readable food name with preparation state (string)
food_master.aliases: Alternative names for the food - regional names, variations (array of strings)
food_master.category: Exchange system category - cereal, pulse, milk, vegetable_non_starchy, vegetable_starchy, fruit, fat, nuts_seeds (string)
food_master.food_type: General food type classification - grain, legume, dairy, fruit, vegetable (string)
food_master.diet_type: Dietary compatibility - vegetarian, vegan, non_vegetarian (array of strings)
food_master.common_serving_unit: Standard serving unit - cup, piece, medium, tbsp, tsp (string)
food_master.common_serving_size_g: Weight in grams for the common serving unit (number)
food_master.last_reviewed: Last review date in ISO format YYYY-MM-DD (string)

macros.omega_3_mg: Omega-3 fatty acids in milligrams per 100g (number)
macros.omega_6_mg: Omega-6 fatty acids in milligrams per 100g (number)

micros.vitamin_d_iu: Vitamin D in International Units per 100g (number)

glycemic_properties.glycemic_classification: GI classification - very_low_gi, low_gi, medium_gi, high_gi, no_gi (string)

food_nutrition_base.calorie_density_kcal_per_g: Calories per gram calculated as calories_kcal divided by 100 (number)
food_nutrition_base.protein_density_g_per_100kcal: Protein grams per 100 kcal - calculated metric for protein efficiency (number)

food_exchange_profile.exchange_category: Exchange system category - cereal, pulse, milk, vegetable_non_starchy, vegetable_starchy, fruit, fat, nuts_seeds (string)
food_exchange_profile.serving_size_per_exchange_g: Weight in grams that equals 1 exchange unit for this food (number)
food_exchange_profile.exchanges_per_common_serving: Number of exchange units in the common serving size (number)

macro_compliance.high_fiber: High fiber content typically greater than 5g per 100g (boolean)
macro_compliance.low_fat: Low fat content typically less than 10g per 100g (boolean)
macro_compliance.high_protein: High protein content typically greater than 15g per 100g (boolean)

micro_compliance.low_sodium: Low sodium content less than 100mg per 100g (boolean)
micro_compliance.low_potassium: Low potassium content for renal diets (boolean)
micro_compliance.low_phosphorus: Low phosphorus content for renal diets (boolean)
micro_compliance.iron_rich: Rich in iron typically greater than 2mg per 100g (boolean)
micro_compliance.calcium_rich: Rich in calcium typically greater than 100mg per 100g (boolean)

food_mnt_profile.food_exclusion_tags: Tags that match MNT exclusion rules (array of strings)
food_mnt_profile.food_inclusion_tags: Tags that match MNT inclusion recommendations (array of strings)
food_mnt_profile.contraindications: Medical conditions where this food should be avoided (array of strings)
food_mnt_profile.preferred_conditions: Medical conditions where this food is particularly beneficial (array of strings)

dosha_effects.vata: Effect on Vata dosha - pacifying, neutral, aggravating, neutral_to_aggravating (string)
dosha_effects.pitta: Effect on Pitta dosha - pacifying, neutral, aggravating, neutral_to_aggravating (string)
dosha_effects.kapha: Effect on Kapha dosha - pacifying, neutral, aggravating, neutral_to_aggravating (string)

food_ayurvedic_profile.rasa: Taste of the food - sweet, sour, salty, bitter, pungent, astringent (array of strings)
food_ayurvedic_profile.virya: Heating or cooling property - heating, cooling, neutral (string)
food_ayurvedic_profile.agni_effect: Effect on digestive fire - improving, neutral, diminishing (string)
food_ayurvedic_profile.digestive_load: Ease of digestion - light, moderate, heavy (string)
food_ayurvedic_profile.cooking_method_preference: Recommended cooking methods for optimal digestion (array of strings)
food_ayurvedic_profile.meal_timing_preference: Optimal meal times - breakfast, mid_morning, lunch, evening, dinner (array of strings)
food_ayurvedic_profile.season_preference: Best seasons for consumption - winter, spring, summer, monsoon, all_seasons (array of strings)

dietary_properties.common_allergens: List of common allergens present (array of strings)
dietary_properties.oxalate_level: Oxalate content level - low, moderate, high (string)
dietary_properties.histamine_level: Histamine content level - low, moderate, high (string)

retrieval_scoring.versatility_score: Recipe versatility and usage range score 0-100 (integer)

recipe_compatibility.primary_recipe_types: Recipe types where this food is commonly used (array of strings)
recipe_compatibility.pairing_foods: Foods that pair well with this food (array of strings)
recipe_compatibility.spice_compatibility: Compatibility with spices - low, medium, high, very_high (string)
